definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Love is the little red umbrella in rainy days, under the umbrella it is always sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是风雨中的那把小红伞，伞下永远是明朗的天。

sentences.english: She sat under a striped umbrella.
Yes, she was still there, a yellow spot under an orange umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 是的，她还在那儿，橘黄色伞下的一个小黄点。

sentences.english: We believe that Smurfs put their 'embryos' in the button of a developing mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为蓝精们把它们的晶胚放在生长的蘑菇伞下。

sentences.english: Love is the little red umbrella in rainy days under the umbrella it is always sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是风雨中的那把小红伞，伞下永远是明朗的天。

definition: to take shelter from the rain
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
Jiepang (Chinese location-based social networking service for mobile devices, in operation 2010-2016)
lit. to avoid the wind/fig. to keep low to avoid a difficult situation/to stay out of trouble
